title: When a leopard was spotted on the sets of 'Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai' - Times of India
text: Karan puts on hold ‘Koffee’ episode with Kapil Sharma When a leopard was spotted on the sets of 'Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai' Mohsin Khan (Kartik) and Shivangi Joshi (Naira) were shooting for a romantic sequence at Film City when a leopard was spotted on the sets. TNN | Updated: Feb 22, 2017, 03.21 PM IST Mohsin Khan (Kartik) and Shivangi Joshi (Naira) were shooting for a romantic sequence at Film City when a leopard was spotted on the sets. Yes, you heard that right! According to reports, Kartik and Naira were shooting for a dance sequence when a leopard entered the premises. The cast couldn't see him present them and the first one to spot him was the director of 'Yeh Rishta...'. As soon as the animal was spotted, the director made an announcement for the entire team to stay put and not run. Apparently, the leopard walked past them and went away. READ ALSO: Mohsin Khan: I am dating Shivangi Joshi Mohsin at that time was on his knees in front of Naira when Shivangi pulled him up between the shot. The cast also screamed. Later again the leopard was seen near the vanity but thanks to the guards who guarded the set throughout the night. Leopard spotting in Film City has been happening for quite some time now and is dangerous for everyone shooting.
